<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove those as well as nothing will include them (and we can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// leave them dangling).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RemovedSections.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#ad409c2de8502b94c8a0b1193307c63b6">contains</a>(Sym.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/symbol/#a5df38f89b6f95758d52fd0d160459b46">AssociativeComdatTargetSectionId</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">            AssociatedSections.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a1b0f3ebdced8fce4b22c6a63b25d9525">insert</a>(Sym.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/symbol/#a383c77f95170e1f95b97fb608a1ab3e2">TargetSectionId</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemovedSections.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#ad409c2de8502b94c8a0b1193307c63b6">contains</a>(Sym.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/symbol/#a383c77f95170e1f95b97fb608a1ab3e2">TargetSectionId</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armlowoverheadloops-cpp/#a3bf42baf773b375802538951c88d8e12">ToRemove</a> = RemoveAssociated;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AssociatedSections.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a9a3c9d867ff6bde97841c2b7983f5c70">empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  updateSections();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  updateSymbols();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/object/#a41639273bf671d1b1a59a5a48eb42ec8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/object/#a41639273bf671d1b1a59a5a48eb42ec8">Object::truncateSections</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/section">Section</a> &amp;)&gt; ToTruncate) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coff/section">Section</a> &amp;Sec : Sections) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ToTruncate(Sec)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec.clearContents();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec.Relocs.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec.Header.SizeOfRawData = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
